Text: Isn't there a format to be followed indicating what is being offered?  If so, for those of us who do not know what you have offered would you please follow the proper method?  Thank you.
can u explain this is for what..???..

It's really easy: WHAT the heck is this program? What does i recover? A Damaged USB, erased files? What this program does? Something like this: USB  recovery tool restore digital pictures images recover lost missing corrupted compact flash files undelete accidently deleted ... That's the "proper method"...they say.
